Description:
Our client is into Entertainment industry. They are now looking for An Entry Operations-Team Leader to join them.  Roles & Responsibilities: Provide leadership and direction to front-line Entry Operations team on turnstiles, ticketing, rental services and guest service, supporting Supervisor and management team in directing and coordinating activities of department and employees. 
Ability to conduct on the job training and mentoring for entry operations attendants, refresher trainings and conducting written assessment for certification.
Assists the Entry Operations Supervisor in the opening of the park following all procedures and ensures operational readiness of entry operations attendants
Provide leadership and direction to front-line Entry Operations team on turnstiles, ticketing, rental services and guest service, supporting Supervisor and management team in directing and coordinating activities of department and employees. 
Ability to conduct on the job training and mentoring for entry operations attendants, refresher trainings and conducting written assessment for certification. Skills
Skills:
College degree
Guest service skills training and certification
IAAPA Certifications

Theme Park / retail / attraction cash handling experience preferred
Fluent in Arabic
Proficient in Microsoft Office
Strong interpersonal skills
